title: Try before you buy! - Rent/Lease To Own Program
posting_body: *Try before you buy lease to own program*
My name is Sean Cochran, and I am a Realtor with eXp Realty in Plainfield.
My company is working with a Lease with a Right to Purchase program called Home Partners of America.
You will apply with Home Partners.
If approved, they will assign you a max monthly rental amount.
You then search their website for available properties in your rental range.
You will go tour the home.
If you like the property, Home Partners purchases the home.
You rent it from Home Partners.
You have up to a 5 year right (but not obligation) to buy the home!
Try before you buy!!!
• Minimum 580 Credit Score
• Annual household income of $40,000+
• Stable employment
• No history of eviction or other landlord issues
• No pending bankruptcy
• No disqualifying criminal history
If interested in applying for the program please email me and I will send you the link to apply.
Good luck!
When you email, please include your name, cell number and real email address.
(CL blocks your actual email address when you email from here.)
Thank you and I look forward to speaking with you!
Sean Cochran
Broker/Realtor
eXp Realty
